name: consulta_receita_federal
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Fetch data from the Receita Federal using a given tax ID.

taxid.description: The tax ID to search for in the Receita Federal database.

maxage.description: The maximum age of the data to be fetched. Defaults to 30.
